element.default: o Acts as advocate for the change at his/her level in the organization and won't let the change initiative die from lack of attention o Demonstrates the behaviors and attitudes that are expected of everyone else o Provides the motivation to change, creates a sense of urgency and importance about the change, and show commitment and passion about getting things done o Holds people in the organization accountable for the change
element.label: Change leader
element.name: continuous_improvement

element.default: o Effectively communicates the vision, leads by example, serves as a role model to others to demonstrate commitment and trust in the organization's vision o Proactively identifies development needs of the team, anticipates need, actively seeks, adapts and implements global best practices in improving work practices and team performance o Creates a collaborative environment, openly encourages performance orientation, establishes norms of group behavior to promote a performance oriented culture o Invests in building leaders for the future
element.label: Impact and Influence on the team
element.name: customer_delight

element.default: o Creates significant potential for new business with the existing customer o Creates new opportunities for new business generation/ helped in establishing relationship with new customer o Develops a pilot project, which helped in new business generation with the existing customers/new customers
element.label: Significant sales or delivery effort
element.name: operational_excellence

element.default: o Champions sporadic change, experimentation and practical utilization of new ideas that shows promise, challenges others to recognize the bigger picture in a situation o Leads by example to adapt to the changing scenario by demonstrating commitment to learning and developing organizational practices that facilitates learning in high impact areas o Creates an entrepreneurial culture
element.label: Innovation and creativity through team
element.name: success_contributors

element.default: o Owns and enforces ISG core values
element.label: Value champion
element.name: value_champion
